info.title: Erstellung und Modifizierung von DN Strings
Verwendung der Filter API um Suchfilter zu erstellen

example.programlisting: $f1 = Zend_Ldap_Filter::equals('name', 'value'); // (name=value) $f2 = Zend_Ldap_Filter::begins('name', 'value'); // (name=value*) $f3 = Zend_Ldap_Filter::ends('name', 'value'); // (name=*value) $f4 = Zend_Ldap_Filter::contains('name', 'value'); // (name=*value*) $f5 = Zend_Ldap_Filter::greater('name', 'value'); // (name>value) $f6 = Zend_Ldap_Filter::greaterOrEqual('name', 'value'); // (name>=value) $f7 = Zend_Ldap_Filter::less('name', 'value'); // (name<value) $f8 = Zend_Ldap_Filter::lessOrEqual('name', 'value'); // (name<=value) $f9 = Zend_Ldap_Filter::approx('name', 'value'); // (name~=value) $f10 = Zend_Ldap_Filter::any('name'); // (name=*)
